tool_description: Millions of movies, TV shows and people to discover
name: Movie Database IMDb
title: Movie Database IMDb

api_list.name: Get movie
Get all movies
Get Popular Movies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-database-imdb.p.rapidapi.com/Popular_Movies/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-database-imdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
